cURL

Python

Copy

```
curl --request POST \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "content": "Hello, how can I help you?",
  "message_type": "outgoing",
  "private": false,
  "content_type": "text",
  "content_attributes": {},
  "campaign_id": 1,
  "template_params": {
    "name": "sample_issue_resolution",
    "category": "UTILITY",
    "language": "en_US",
    "processed_params": {
      "1": "Chatwoot"
    }
  }
}'
```

#### Authorizations

userApiKeyagentBotApiKey

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#parameter-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the conversation

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-content)

content

string

required

The content of the message

Example:

`"Hello, how can I help you?"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-message-type)

message\_type

enum<string>

The type of the message

Available options:

`outgoing`,

`incoming`

Example:

`"outgoing"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-private)

private

boolean

Flag to identify if it is a private note

Example:

`false`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-content-type)

content\_type

enum<string>

Content type of the message

Available options:

`text`,

`input_email`,

`cards`,

`input_select`,

`form`,

`article`

Example:

`"text"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-content-attributes)

content\_attributes

object

Attributes based on the content type

Example:

```
{}
```

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-campaign-id)

campaign\_id

integer

The campaign id to which the message belongs

Example:

`1`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-template-params)

template\_params

object

The template params for the message in case of whatsapp Channel

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-template-params-name)

template\_params.name

string

Name of the template

Example:

`"sample_issue_resolution"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-template-params-category)

template\_params.category

string

Category of the template

Example:

`"UTILITY"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-template-params-language)

template\_params.language

string

Language of the template

Example:

`"en_US"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages/create-new-message#body-template-params-processed-params)

template\_params.processed\_params

object

The processed param values for template variables in template

Example:

```
{ "1": "Chatwoot" }
```
